many many thanks malikjee for awesome classic
i was looking for this from a long time
 u believe this or not but just 1 hour before u shared this movie, i was making u request to share this movie..but my comment was not submitted due to some error.
Its like u make some wish and it become true so quickly
once again thank u so much for this nice work

nice upload sir...saw dis movie on DD national long tym bak..highly recomended....SIR JI..ONE REQUEST PLZ SEE IF U CAN DO IT...SIR UPLOAD 'MASSEY SAHEB' STARRING RAGHUVIR YADAV...PLZ SIR SEE IF U CAN UPLOAD IT

New film to me,thanks SIRJI for this..
thnx,pls upload movie vandana actor prikshit sahni.sadhna
sirjee uploading classics pe classics...many many thanks!!

I am eternally grateful to you for uploading this forgotten gem.One of the best sports related hindi movies.
Since you uploaded this rare gem,I have a request and hope(against hope) you could upload this rare old gem-
"Chotti Chotti Baatein" starring Motilal,Nadira.
